Sipunculus vastus
; type locality: Jaluit , Marshall Islands (without details). — Cutler et al. 1992: 154 ( Isla del Caño, Costa Rica , under boulders and in debris coral). — Dean 2001: 86–87 (same data as preceding). Questionable records in the TEP.
